short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clipboard for Chrome. Copying your clips just one click away. Easy search, custom labels and pinned clips.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CopyClip keeps your frequently used clips, so when you need, you can just click them and it will get copied to your clipboard. Clips can be pinned at the top, and you search clips by name or can label them to filter further.
